name: "Blood In The Walls" PROTOTYPE
description:
"The noises we hear at night - you know the sounds. The creaking, settling sounds of the house finally resting. We all hear them, but it's just the house and nothing else... right?"

THERE IS NO ENDING. THIS IS JUST A PROTOTYPE FOR GAMEPLAY.

Blood In The Walls is a concept created and designed by Max Fleet and being tested out as a core game idea. This is just an extremely simple demo of a concept - not much gameplay value, except a general atmosphere and nothing else. Please do not expect a full game, monsters, AI etc (it's just a bare bones map with brand new textures, models and visual graphics.

Please give me feedback on a general feel for the atmosphere and visuals, I need ideas and to get a feel if it's worth working on!

Thanks!

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement

F - Interact

SPACE BAR - Bring Up Camera/Flashlight

HOLD LEFT CTRL - Crouch
